Name: Mire
About the game: Mire is a game that combines few genres in a casual manner. Your goal is to beat levels which get more difficult with time. As you continue to beat them you will unlock more cards. You can upgrade them with the money you have gathered to progress even further. Finally completing all character levels allows you to access nsfw minigame for that character. Features: Dexterity nsfw minigame Plenty of levels with increasing difficulty Collectibility of cards etc. Upgrading to become stronger How to play Click pieces to damage opponent. Use wasd to move camera. Hold shift to inspect cards and pieces. Use cards abilities by clicking the cards.
